title: Keep getting this error message every time i go to do something

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
https://gyazo.com/2fb9f64ad7af4e35b353ace6af3dd11d

its so obnoxious.
when it pops up several others pop up with it, and the funny thing is its only on this account. When I am on my other account its fine so its tripping me out.

anyone know how to fix it.

replies.body: I'm getting this too. Every time I click on anything, get into a game lobby, select a champion or even add a bot to a custom game. Very irritating - it's making calling lanes a bit problematic when I'm getting up to four in a row. Hope there's a fix soon.

Hey there,

This is currently a [known issue](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/AnHEmOh7-club-tag-creation-disabled-and-server-error-message-in-client) and a hotfix should be deployed soon.
Getting the same issue, is your chat disconnecting also?
